name: Spindrift Spritz
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Elemental Master's Handbook © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: You can cast this spell only as a response to a target attempting a saving throw against an effect that would cause the fatigued, shaken, sickened, or staggered conditions. The target can roll its saving throw twice and take the higher result.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你只有当一个目标尝试进行一次针对造成疲乏，战栗，恶心，恍惚效果的豁免检定时才能对那个生物使用。目标的这次豁免检定可以双骰取高。
